Buff.Name: Word Shatter
Buff.Desc: When allies use their Ultimate to attack an enemy target, inflicts the target with Shatter, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> time(s). At the start of the target's turn or when the target is defeated, deals a set amount of DMG to the target and adjacent targets based on the number of Shatter stacks.

Option.Name: Rupture
Option.Desc: When enemy targets with Shatter are defeated, increases DMG dealt by Ultimate for all allies in this battle by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>, stacking up to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> times.

Option.Name: Calumny
Option.Desc: Increases DMG dealt with Shatter by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When triggered, applies 1 stack of Shatter to adjacent targets.

Option.Name: Expostulation
Option.Desc: When allies' follow-up attacks hit enemy targets, there is a <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> fixed chance to apply 1 stack of Shatter to the target. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack per enemy target.
